1 #ifndef _PETSC_CPP
2 #define _PETSC_CPP
3 #include "ls_petsc.h"
7 template <class Tx, class Tad>
8 LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::LinearSolverPetsc(std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> val_mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> val_config){
9  const auto nic = val_mesh->nic;
10  const auto njc = val_mesh->njc;
11  const auto nq = val_mesh->solution->nq;
12  const auto ntrans = val_mesh->solution->ntrans;
13  n = nic*njc*(nq+ntrans);
14  PetscInitialize(&val_config->argc, &val_config->argv, NULL, NULL);
15 
16  PetscErrorCode ierr;
17  ierr = VecCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, &dq);
18  ierr = PetscObjectSetName((PetscObject) dq, "Solution");
19  ierr = VecSetSizes(dq, PETSC_DECIDE, n);
20  ierr = VecSetFromOptions(dq);
21  ierr = VecDuplicate(dq,&rhs);
22 
23  MatCreateSeqAIJ(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, n, n, MAX_NNZ, NULL, &lhs);
24 
25  ierr = KSPCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, &ksp);
26  ierr = KSPSetOperators(ksp, lhs, lhs);
27  ierr = KSPGetPC(ksp, &pc);
28  ierr = PCSetType(pc, PCLU);
29  ierr = KSPSetType(ksp, KSPGMRES);
30  ierr = KSPSetTolerances(ksp, 1e-7, PETSC_DEFAULT, PETSC_DEFAULT, PETSC_DEFAULT);
31  ierr = KSPSetFromOptions(ksp);
32  MatSetBlockSize(lhs, nq+ntrans);
33 };
34 
35 template <class Tx, class Tad>
36 LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::~LinearSolverPetsc(){
37  VecDestroy(&rhs);
38  VecDestroy(&dq);
39  MatDestroy(&lhs);
40  PetscFinalize();
41 };

44 void LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::preallocate(int nnz){

46 };

48 template <class Tx, class Tad>
49 void LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::set_lhs(int nnz, unsigned int *rind, unsigned int *cind, Tx *values){
50  number_lhs_update += 1;
51  PetscScalar value_tmp;
52  PetscErrorCode ierr;
53  int row_idx, col_idx;
54  for(size_t i=0; i<nnz; i++){
55  value_tmp = values[i];
56  row_idx = rind[i];
57  col_idx = cind[i];
58  MatSetValue(lhs, row_idx, col_idx, value_tmp ,INSERT_VALUES);
59  }
60  MatAssemblyBegin(lhs, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
61  MatAssemblyEnd(lhs, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
62 };
63 
64 template <class Tx, class Tad>
65 void LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::set_rhs(Tx *val_rhs){
66  number_rhs_update += 1;
67  PetscScalar value_tmp;
68  PetscErrorCode ierr;
69  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
70  value_tmp = val_rhs[i];
71  VecSetValue(rhs, i, value_tmp, INSERT_VALUES);
72  }
73 };
74 
75 template <class Tx, class Tad>
76 void LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::solve(){
77  if(number_rhs_update != number_lhs_update){
78  spdlog::get("console")->warn("Number of rhs update does not match with the number of lhs update!");
79  }
80  KSPSolve(ksp, rhs, dq);
81 };
82 
83 template <class Tx, class Tad>
84 void LinearSolverPetsc<Tx, Tad>::solve_and_update(Tx *q, Tx under_relaxation){
85  solve();
86  VecGetArray(dq, &dq_array);
87  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++){
88  q[i] = q[i] + dq_array[i]*under_relaxation;
89  }
90 };
